title: Bug 104630: Column icons not appearing in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector, the column icons are not being displayed.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not appear.
EB: The expected result is that the table icons and column icons should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application
2. Connect to a Derby database
3. Navigate to the Available Items sector
4. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon
5. Verify that the column icons are not displayed
